deepSearch.label: Deep Search
deepSearch.tooltip: Delegate RAG retrieval to Rico Senior
deepSearch.tooltipDescription:
Delegates retrieval to a specialized agent for deeper search across your knowledge.

Activating this feature will result in slower but more thorough replies. A downloadable transcript of the search process will be attached to the conversation.
deepSearch.tooltipDisabled: This agent does not support deep search delegation.
deepSearch.description: Runs a deeper retrieval pass with a specialized agent. Enables slower but more thorough answers.

logGenius.label: Log Genius
logGenius.tooltip: Analyze recent logs for quick diagnosis
logGenius.tooltipDescription: Analyze recent logs and summarize likely issues with next steps.
logGenius.description: Runs a short investigation over the last few minutes of logs and returns a ready-to-use diagnosis.
logGenius.prompt: Analyze the last 5 minutes of logs and summarize likely issues with next steps.

searchOptionsTooltip.description:

attachments.includeTooltipOff: Attachments are excluded from retrieval for this conversation.

tooltip.description:
Files attached to this conversation.
The files are processed by faster but less precise algorithms. The agent may use these files to answer.

Note that this feature is in beta and may not work perfectly for all file types. For persistent corpora, consider using document libraries.
tooltip.disabled: This agent does not use attachments.

settings.confirmDeleteAllMessage: This action will permanently delete all conversations. Do you want to continue?

chatContextTooltip.description:
Select reusable context snippets included with every message in this conversation.

These prompt instructions is automatically included in the agents system prompt and thus works with all agents.

Note that each agent also expose its internal prompt tuning options in the agent settings. Those are agent-specific and not shared across agents. Using the chat context allows to adapt agents global behavior to your needs.

pipeline.title: Configure Processing Pipeline
pipeline.description: Choose the chain of processors to apply for each file type in this library.
pipeline.savedDetail: Processing pipeline has been configured for library "{{name}}".
pipeline.libraryProcessorsHelper: These processors run once at the library level after documents have been processed.
pipeline.helpIntro: Pipelines let you decide which processors run on your documents and when.
pipeline.helpInputBody: Convert raw files into normalized previews (Markdown or tables) per file type.
pipeline.helpOutputBody: Post-process each document (vectorize, load tables, summarize). They can run right after ingestion or later from the Operations tab.
pipeline.helpLibraryBody: Run once per library to build shared assets (like a library TOC). They run later from the Operations tab, not during ingestion.

libraryEdit.updateFailedDetail: An error occurred while updating the library. Please try again.

search.strictDescription: Strict search prioritizes precision over coverage. It applies tighter constraints (e.g., stronger keyword/metadata matching and/or higher similarity thresholds) so only highly confident results are retrieved. Use this when you want to avoid ‘maybe relevant’ documents, or when your corpus is large and you prefer fewer, more exact sources. If nothing matches strongly, results may be sparse.
search.hybridDescription: Hybrid search combines keyword matching (exact terms, names, IDs) with semantic similarity. It is the best option when your question contains specific terminology (component names, error codes, APIs) but also benefits from conceptual matching. Hybrid typically improves recall while keeping precision high, at the cost of slightly more computation.
search.semanticDescription: Semantic search uses embeddings to retrieve passages that are conceptually similar to your question, even if they don’t share the same words. This usually finds the most relevant context for broad or exploratory questions, but it can sometimes include loosely related results when your query is very short or ambiguous.
